title: Andy Cohen | Rep. Madison Cawthorn Says House Colleagues Hold Orgies and Do Cocaine: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at Republican Congressman Madison Cawthorn accusing his colleagues of doing cocaine and holding orgies while Trump decided to ask Putin to dig up dirt on the Bidens.

Then, Andy Cohen talks about celebrating the 13th anniversary of Watch What Happens Live, reading to his son and what his mom thinks of his show. Plus, he discusses the new cast of The Real Housewives of New York City, shares his thoughts on Will Smith slapping Chris Rock at the Oscars and reveals what to expect from The Real Housewives of Dubai.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
